Name: Exoplanet
About the game: Exoplanet is a work in progress procedural galaxy RPG written from the ground up for VR. Exoplanet is inspired by the classic PC game Starflight. You can explore thousands of star systems and the worlds they contain entirely in room scale virtual reality. Discover icy, molten, rocky or Earth like planets, each with unique features and terrain. Build your ship, recruit your crew, encounter alien species, engage in combat or diplomacy and discover what's out there... Almost everything you see in Exoplanet is created during run time.
Meta Title: Exoplanet: Jul 25, 2018, Gregg Brzozowski and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Exoplanet? Check out the release date (Jul 25, 2018), developer insights from Gregg Brzozowski, and a complete game summary.
